metadata.title: CVE-2024-49892 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/amd/display: Initialize get_bytes_per_element's default to 1  Variables, used as denominators and maybe not assigned to other values, should not be 0. bytes_per_element_y & bytes_per_element_c are initialized by get_bytes_per_element() which should never return 0.  This fixes 10 DIVIDE_BY_ZERO issues reported by Coverity.
